ability.name: Mega Boost
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may attach a Special Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Mega Evolution Pokémon.

attacks.name: Hyperspace Punch
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage to 2 of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Portal Strike
attacks.text: This Pokémon can't use Portal Strike during your next turn.

ability.name: Aroma of Gratitude
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may heal 20 damage from each of your Benched Basic Pokémon.

attacks.name: Floral Gain
attacks.text: Heal 20 damage and remove all Special Conditions from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Break Through
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: X Blast
attacks.text: This Pokémon can't use X Blast during your next turn.

attacks.name: Evil Ball
attacks.text: This attack does 20 more damage times the amount of Energy attached to both Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Y Cyclone
attacks.text: Move an Energy from this Pokémon to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Land's Pulse
attacks.text: If there is any Stadium card in play, this attack does 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Cell Storm
attacks.text: Heal 30 damage from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Rumble
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Geostrike
attacks.text: This attack does 10 damage to each of your Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Stoke
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for up to 2 {R} Energy cards and attach them to this Pokémon. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Shining Flame
attacks.text: This Pokémon can't use Shining Flame during your next turn.

attacks.name: Right Back at You
attacks.text: Discard all Energy attached to this Pokémon. During your opponent's next turn, if this Pokémon is damaged by an attack (even if this Pokémon is Knocked Out), put damage counters on the Attacking Pokémon equal to the damage done to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Aeroblast
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 more damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Double Scrapper
attacks.text: Discard up to 2 Pokémon Tool cards attached to your opponent's Pokémon.

attacks.name: Pin Missile
attacks.text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 40 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Hazard Stinger
attacks.text: Discard all Energy attached to this Pokémon. Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed and Poisoned. Put 4 damage counters instead of 1 on that Pokémon between turns.

name: Beedrill Spirit Link
text: Your turn does not end if the Pokémon this card is attached to becomes M Beedrill-EX.

attacks.name: Frosty Thunder
attacks.text: If this Pokémon has any {L} Energy attached to it, this attack does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Destructive Flame
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Aqua Shower
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Dual Cut
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 60 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Smokescreen
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Concentrated Fire
attacks.text: Flip a coin for each {R} Energy attached to this Pokémon. This attack does 50 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Combustion Impact
attacks.text: Your opponent switches his or her Active Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Entertain
attacks.text: Heal 40 damage from 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Prismatic Wave
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage times the number of different types of Pokémon on your opponent's Bench.

attacks.name: Hollow Geist
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused and Poisoned.

attacks.name: Shred
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Hyper Beam
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Crimson Edge
attacks.text: This Pokémon does 10 damage to itself for each damage counter on it.

name: Garchomp Spirit Link
text: Your turn does not end if the Pokémon this card is attached to becomes M Garchomp-EX.

attacks.name: Beastly Fang
attacks.text: This attack does 50 more damage for each of your opponent's Pokémon-EX.

attacks.name: Dragon Strike
attacks.text: This Pokémon can't use Dragon Strike during your next turn.

attacks.name: Savage Wing
attacks.text: Discard as many basic {R} Energy attached to this Pokémon as you like. This attack does 40 more damage for each Energy card discarded in this way.

name: Salamence Spirit Link
text: Your turn does not end if the Pokémon this card is attached to becomes M Salamence-EX.

ability.name: Steam Up
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard a {R} Energy card from your hand. If you do, during this turn, your Basic {R} Pokémon's attacks do 30 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Volcanic Heat
attacks.text: This Pokémon can't attack during your next turn.

attacks.name: Thundershock
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Mega Thunderbolt
attacks.text: Discard all Energy attached to this Pokémon.

ability.name: Mystic Heart
ability.text: Prevent all effects of your opponent's attacks, except damage, done to each of your Pokémon that has any {M} Energy attached to it. (Existing effects are not removed.)

attacks.name: Soul Blaster
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon's Soul Blaster attack's base damage is 60.

name: Karen
text: Each player shuffles all Pokémon in his or her discard pile into his or her deck.

ability.name: Immunity
ability.text: This Pokémon can't be affected by any Special Conditions. (Remove any Special Conditions affecting this Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Body Slam
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Turbo Flame
attacks.text: Attach 2 basic Energy cards from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Silent Bite
attacks.text: You may leave your opponent's Active Pokémon Paralyzed. If you do, shuffle this Pokémon and all cards attached to it into your deck.

attacks.name: Wings of Disaster
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon. Don't apply Weakness and Resistance. Discard all Pokémon Tool cards attached to each of your opponent's Pokémon.

attacks.name: Photon Wave
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done by attacks from the Defending Pokémon is reduced by 30 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

ability.name: Devour Light
ability.text: Each Pokémon BREAK has no Abilities (this includes Abilities of its previous Evolution).

attacks.name: Shadow Claw
attacks.text: Discard a random card from your opponent's hand.

attacks.name: Concentrated Fire
attacks.text: Flip a coin for each {R} Energy attached to this Pokémon. This attack does 50 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Combustion Impact
attacks.text: Your opponent switches his or her Active Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Entertain
attacks.text: Heal 40 damage from 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Prismatic Wave
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage times the number of different types of Pokémon on your opponent's Bench.

attacks.name: Time Call
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a card that evolves from 1 of your Pokémon and put it onto that Pokémon. (This counts as evolving that Pokémon.) Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Leech Seed
attacks.text: Heal 10 damage from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Aromatherapy
attacks.text: Heal 30 damage from each of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Magical Leaf
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage and heal 20 damage from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Energy Assist
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, attach a basic Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Victory Ball
attacks.text: Discard a {R} Energy attached to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Marine Guidance
attacks.text: Search your deck for a {W} Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Aqua Ring
attacks.text: Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

ability.name: Justified
ability.text: Each of this Pokémon's attacks does 50 more damage to {D} Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Sacred Sword
attacks.text: This Pokémon can't use Sacred Sword during your next turn.

attacks.name: Clairvoyance
attacks.text: Your opponent reveals his or her hand.

attacks.name: Psychic
attacks.text: This attack does 10 more damage for each Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Soprano Wave
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads to each of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Entrancing Melody
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Abyssal Sleep
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep. Your opponent flips 2 coins instead of 1 between turns. If either of them is tails, that Pokémon is still Asleep.

attacks.name: Precognitive Dream
attacks.text: Draw 3 cards. This Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Iron Head
attacks.text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Linear Attack
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Destructor Beam
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Type Switch
attacks.text: Choose {G}, {R}, {W}, {L}, {P}, {F}, {D}, {M}, {Y}, or {N} type. Until the end of your next turn, this Pokémon is that type.

attacks.name: Power Blast
attacks.text: Discard an Energy attached to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Magma Eruption
attacks.text: You may discard the top 3 cards of each player’s deck. If you do, this attack does 40 more damage for each Energy card you discarded in this way.

name: Camerupt Spirit Link
text: Your turn does not end if the Pokémon this card is attached to becomes M Camerupt-EX.

attacks.name: Torpedo Dive
attacks.text: This attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon for each {C} in that Pokémon's Retreat Cost. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

name: Sharpedo Spirit Link
text: Your turn does not end if the Pokémon this card is attached to becomes M Sharpedo-EX.

attacks.name: Charge
attacks.text: Search your deck for a {L} Energy card and attach it to this Pokémon. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Thunderbolt
attacks.text: Discard all Energy attached to this Pokémon.
